value_claims.claim_title: DB Lumina reduces research report creation time
value_claims.claim_description: Deutsche Bank's AI-powered research agent DB Lumina automates data analysis and streamlines workflows, reducing the time-consuming manual process of creating research reports and notes for analysts.
value_claims.source_quote: creating research reports and notes relies heavily on a foundation of painstaking manual work...this time-consuming process can limit the depth of analysis and the range of topics they can cover.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: DB Lumina is explicitly described as an AI-powered research agent that automates data analysis and streamlines workflows to reduce manual work in report creation.

value_claims.claim_title: DB Lumina deployed to 5,000 users across Deutsche Bank Research
value_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina went live in September 2024 and is currently used by approximately 5,000 users across Deutsche Bank Research divisions including Investment Bank Origination & Advisory and Fixed Income & Currencies.
value_claims.source_quote: Currently, DB Lumina is already in the hands of around 5,000 users across Deutsche Bank Research, specifically in divisions like Investment Bank Origination & Advisory and Fixed Income & Currencies.
value_claims.quote_location: Bringing new benefits to the business section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim directly reports adoption numbers for the AI tool DB Lumina, indicating organizational acceptance and deployment scale.

value_claims.claim_title: Planned expansion to 10,000+ users across Deutsche Bank
value_claims.claim_description: Deutsche Bank plans to expand DB Lumina deployment from the current 5,000 users to more than 10,000 users across the organization.
value_claims.source_quote: We plan to roll it out to more than 10,000 users across
value_claims.quote_location: Bringing new benefits to the business section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The planned expansion demonstrates organizational commitment to scaling the AI tool beyond initial deployment, indicating expected value delivery.

value_claims.claim_title: AI reduces repetitive banking tasks by 40-60%
value_claims.claim_description: Banks including JPMorgan and Deutsche Bank are reducing repetitive tasks by 40 to 60% through agentic AI tools and internal copilots.
value_claims.source_quote: From JPMorgan's AI pitchbook tools to Deutsche Bank's internal copilots, banks are reducing repetitive tasks by 40 to 60%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly attributes the 40-60% reduction in repetitive tasks to AI tools and copilots deployed by banks.

value_claims.claim_title: AI enables 10-hour tasks to be completed in 10 seconds
value_claims.claim_description: According to JPMorgan's Co-Head of Investment Banking, AI enables tasks that previously took 10 hours to be completed in 10 seconds.
value_claims.source_quote: AI will enable us to do tasks that take 10 hours in 10 seconds – Jay Horine, Co-Head of Investment Banking at JPMorgan
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The quote directly attributes dramatic time reduction (10 hours to 10 seconds) to AI capabilities in investment banking tasks.

value_claims.claim_title: Hedge funds achieve 40%+ efficiency gains with AI
value_claims.claim_description: Smaller hedge funds are experiencing efficiency gains of over 40% through AI implementation, representing both productivity improvement and margin expansion.
value_claims.source_quote: Even smaller hedge funds are seeing 40%+ efficiency gains, according to Hedgeweek. That's not just productivity, that's margin expansion.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim directly attributes 40%+ efficiency gains to AI implementation in hedge funds, with explicit mention of productivity and margin impact.

value_claims.claim_title: One AI-empowered analyst can do the work of five
value_claims.claim_description: With AI tools, a single analyst can perform the work that previously required five analysts, representing a 5x productivity multiplier.
value_claims.source_quote: One AI-empowered analyst can do the work of five.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly states that AI empowerment enables one analyst to replace five, directly attributing the productivity gain to AI.

value_claims.claim_description: With appropriate AI tools, a 15-person firm can achieve performance levels exceeding a traditional 50-person team, representing a 3.3x efficiency advantage.
value_claims.source_quote: With the right AI tools, a 15-person firm can outperform a 50-person team. – Artis M&A founder
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The claim explicitly attributes the ability of a smaller firm to outperform a larger one to the deployment of AI tools.

context_claims.claim_title: Deutsche Bank Research is the organizational unit
context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina was developed for and deployed within Deutsche Bank Research, the research division of Deutsche Bank.
context_claims.source_quote: At Deutsche Bank Research, the core mission of our analysts is delivering original, independent economic and financial analysis.

context_claims.claim_description: The case operates within the financial services sector, specifically investment banking and research divisions.
context_claims.source_quote: maintaining the stringent data privacy requirements for the highly regulated financial sector

context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina supports the financial research and analysis function, including creating research reports, analyzing financial statements, and synthesizing market information.
context_claims.source_quote: delivering original, independent economic and financial analysis...creating research reports and notes

context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina was developed over more than 12 months of collaboration before going live in September 2024.
context_claims.source_quote: The adoption of the DB Lumina digital assistant by hundreds of research analysts is the culmination of more than 12 months of intense collaboration

context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina went live in production environment in September 2024.
DB Lumina operates at enterprise scale with 5,000 current users across multiple divisions including Investment Bank Origination & Advisory and Fixed Income & Currencies.
context_claims.source_quote: Currently, DB Lumina is already in the hands of around 5,000 users across Deutsche Bank Research, specifically in divisions like Investment Bank Origination & Advisory and Fixed Income & Currencies.

context_claims.claim_title: Enhance analyst experience and reduce manual processes
context_claims.claim_description: The strategic goal was to enhance the research analyst experience, reduce reliance on manual processes and outsourcing, and enable faster delivery of insights to market.
context_claims.source_quote: Our goal was to enhance the research analyst experience and reduce the reliance on manual processes and outsourcing.

context_claims.claim_title: DB Lumina: AI-powered research agent with three core features
context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina is an AI-powered research agent with three key features: Gen AI-powered chat, Prompt templates, and Knowledge (RAG architecture).
context_claims.source_quote: DB Lumina has three key features that transform the research experience for analysts and enhance productivity through advanced technologies.

context_claims.claim_description: DB Lumina performs document ingestion, content summarization, Q&A, and editing functions for research analysts.
context_claims.source_quote: DB Lumina was designed to enhance Deutsche Bank Research's productivity by enabling document ingestion, content summarization, Q&A, and editing.

context_claims.claim_description: Deutsche Bank developed DB Lumina in collaboration with Google Cloud Consulting and deployed it on Google Cloud infrastructure.
context_claims.source_quote: We developed an initial pilot for DB Lumina with Google Cloud Consulting...Built on Google Cloud, the architecture leverages the following services
